mapper.select: select from ap_histories where behavior_entry_id=#{dto.userId} order by created_time desc limit ${(dto.page-1)*dto.size},${dto.size}
mapper.insert: insert into ap_histories (id, behavior_entry_id, entry_id, created_time, published_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{behaviorEntryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{publishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into ap_histories
id,
behavior_entry_id,
entry_id,
created_time,
published_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{behaviorEntryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{entryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{publishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update ap_histories
behavior_entry_id = #{behaviorEntryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
entry_id = #{entryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
published_time = #{publishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
